HERO.TITLE: Connect with Top Influencers
HERO.SUBTITLE: Find the perfect match between brands and creators with our AI-powered platform that delivers authentic partnerships and measurable results.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How InfluMatch Works
HOW_IT_WORKS.SUBTITLE: Discover how our platform connects brands with the perfect influencers to create powerful marketing partnerships.
HOW_IT_WORKS.HERO_SUBTITLE: Our intuitive platform makes finding and collaborating with influencers easier than ever before.
HOW_IT_WORKS.PROCESS_SUBTITLE: Our streamlined process helps you find the perfect match and start collaborating quickly.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP1_DESC: Set up your brand or influencer profile with all the details that make you unique. Our intelligent system will use this information to find your perfect matches.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP2_DESC: Our AI-powered algorithm analyzes profiles to suggest the most compatible partnerships based on audience demographics, engagement rates, and brand values.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP3_DESC: Reach out through our secure messaging system to discuss campaign details, negotiate terms, and establish a working relationship.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP4_DESC: Track campaign performance with our comprehensive analytics dashboard. Monitor engagement, conversions, and ROI to optimize future collaborations.
HOW_IT_WORKS.FEATURES_SUBTITLE: Our platform offers unique features designed to make influencer marketing more effective.
HOW_IT_WORKS.FEATURE1_DESC: Every influencer and brand on our platform is thoroughly verified to ensure authentic partnerships.
HOW_IT_WORKS.FEATURE2_DESC: Our proprietary algorithm finds the most relevant matches based on your specific requirements.
HOW_IT_WORKS.FEATURE3_DESC: Gain valuable insights with comprehensive performance metrics and audience data.
HOW_IT_WORKS.FEATURE4_DESC: Our team of experts is available to help you navigate the platform and optimize your campaigns.
HOW_IT_WORKS.TESTIMONIAL: InfluMatch transformed our influencer marketing strategy. We found perfect partners who truly understand our brand values, resulting in authentic content that resonates with our target audience.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CTA_SUBTITLE: Join thousands of brands and influencers who are creating successful partnerships on InfluMatch.

SUCCESS_CASES.TITLE: Real Results, Real Impact
SUCCESS_CASES.SUBTITLE: Discover how brands and influencers achieve remarkable success through our platform
SUCCESS_CASES.FEATURED_TITLE: How Lumina Fashion Transformed Their Digital Presence
SUCCESS_CASES.FEATURED_DESC: Lumina Fashion partnered with our curated network of fashion influencers to launch their summer collection, resulting in unprecedented engagement and sales growth.
SUCCESS_CASES.GALLERY_SUBTITLE: Explore how our platform has helped brands across different industries
SUCCESS_CASES.CASE1_DESC: How Brand X grew 150% using our influencers.
SUCCESS_CASES.CASE2_DESC: Influencer Y reached 1M followers in 2 weeks.
SUCCESS_CASES.CASE3_DESC: Startup Z sold out in 24h with our network.
SUCCESS_CASES.TESTIMONIAL: InfluMatch completely transformed how we connect with brands. We've seen a 300% increase in collaboration opportunities since joining, and the quality of partnerships has been exceptional.

PLANS.TITLE: Choose Your Plan
PLANS.SUBTITLE: Select the perfect plan for your influencer marketing needs
PLANS.ENTERPRISE_DESC: We offer tailored Enterprise plans for large organizations with specific requirements. Our team will work with you to create a custom solution.
PLANS.TESTIMONIAL: InfluMatch has completely transformed how we approach influencer marketing. The platform's ease of use and powerful analytics have helped us increase our ROI by over 300% in just six months.
PLANS.FAQ1_QUESTION: Can I change my plan later?
PLANS.FAQ1_ANSWER: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be applied at the start of your next billing cycle.
PLANS.FAQ2_QUESTION: Is there a contract or commitment?
PLANS.FAQ2_ANSWER: No, all our plans are subscription-based with no long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime.
PLANS.FAQ3_QUESTION: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
PLANS.FAQ3_ANSWER: Yes, we offer special pricing for non-profit organizations. Please contact our sales team for more information.
PLANS.FAQ4_QUESTION: What payment methods do you accept?
PLANS.FAQ4_ANSWER: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help. Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
CONTACT.NAME: Your Name
CONTACT.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT.MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: Message must be at least 10 characters
CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for reaching out. Your message has been received, and we'll get back to you shortly.
CONTACT.ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't send your message. Please try again or contact us directly via email.
CONTACT.ADDRESS: 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007, USA
CONTACT.FAQ1_QUESTION: How quickly will I receive a response?
CONTACT.FAQ1_ANSWER: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please indicate this in your message subject.
CONTACT.FAQ2_QUESTION: Do you offer customer support on weekends?
CONTACT.FAQ2_ANSWER: Our customer support team is available Monday through Friday. For weekend support, Pro and Business plan customers have access to our priority support line.
CONTACT.FAQ3_QUESTION: Can I schedule a demo of your platform?
CONTACT.FAQ3_ANSWER: Yes! We'd be happy to show you how InfluMatch works. Please select 'Sales Question' from the subject dropdown and mention that you're interested in a demo.
CONTACT.FAQ4_QUESTION: Do you have offices in other countries?
CONTACT.FAQ4_ANSWER: Currently, our main office is in New York, but we have remote team members across the globe. We serve clients worldwide regardless of location.

FOOTER.ABOUT_TEXT: InfluMatch connects top influencers with leading brands to create powerful marketing partnerships that drive results. Our platform makes collaboration simple, transparent, and effective.
FOOTER.NEWSLETTER_TEXT: Stay updated with the latest trends in influencer marketing and platform features.
